about_the_game:
150 vouchers is equal to the cash value of more than 20 dollars, which can only be purchased once. After purchasing DLC, please select the character you want to activate before entering the game (only one character can be activated, so choose the server carefully)

Note: Not all gift packages in [New Version] can use vouchers!!
The following items cannot be purchased with vouchers:
First Recharge, Adventure Card, Privilege Card, Growth fund and some limited-time event products. For details, please refer to the purchase interface in the game

The purchase of DLC is not counted in the weekly Cumulative Top Up Event

Players who have bought DLC in the old version will receive the vouchers again in the inventory after selecting the server in the new version (only one character can be activated, so choose the server carefully)
